title: Caitlin Clark, Angel Reese make WNBA All-Star roster
creator: Field Level Media
content: Indiana Fever guard Caitlin Clark and Chicago Sky forward Angel Reese are All-Stars as WNBA rookies, earning berths on the WNBA’s team that will oppose Team USA in the All-Star Game on July 20 in Phoenix. Clark ranked among the top 10 in voting by fans, players and media, giving her automatic qualification to Team WNBA. Indiana’s Aliyah Boston, the Los Angeles Sparks’ Dearica Hamby and the Dallas Wings’ Arike Ogunbowale landed their All-Star spots in the same manner. The other six players who...

title: Japan launches new banknotes with hologram portraits
creator: Reuters
content: TOKYO >> Japan began circulating its first new banknotes in 20 years on Wednesday, featuring three-dimensional portraits of the founders of financial and female education institutions in an attempt to frustrate counterfeiters. The notes use printed patterns to generate holograms of the portraits facing different directions, depending on the angle of view, employing a technology that Japan’s National Printing Bureau says is the world’s first for paper money. “Faces of those representing Japan’s...

title: Procès de Trump: le prononcé de la peine reporté, bousculé par la Cour suprême
creator: Le Vif
content: Le prononcé de la peine qu’encourt l’ex-président américain Donald Trump, après sa condamnation pénale devant la justice new-yorkaise pour falsifications comptables, est reporté au 18 septembre. Cette décision devait normalement tomber le 11 juillet. La sentence du procès pénal de Donald Trump pour paiements dissimulés à une star du X, prévue dans neuf jours, a été reportée au 18 septembre, un premier effet de la lourde décision de la Cour suprême sur l’immunité de l’ancien...

title: Départ en vacances: attention aux amendes
creator: Le Vif
content: Deux Wallons sur cinq ont déjà eu une amende en vacances. La plupart concernaient des excès de vitesse. Un peu plus de la moitié (56%) des Wallons qui partent en vacances à l’étranger cet été seront amenés à prendre le volant dans leur pays de destination, que ce soit de leur propre voiture ou un véhicule de location, selon une étude de l’Agence wallonne pour la sécurité routière ( AWSR ). Au total, 46% des Wallons prévoient de partir en vacances à l’étranger cet été. La...

title: Inslee headlines kickoff event for statewide campaign to address gender pay gap
creator: Rick Morgan

title: Orioles’ Grayson Rodriguez dominates Mariners again in 2-0 win
creator: Jacob Calvin Meyer
content: SEATTLE — The last time Grayson Rodriguez faced the Mariners, the Orioles starting pitcher handed the ball to his bullpen in the seventh inning with a 2-0 lead. Tuesday night, Rodriguez handed the ball to his bullpen in the seventh inning with a 2-0 lead. That’s where the déjà vu ended. In May, Baltimore’s bullpen coughed up Rodriguez’s lead as Seattle came back for the victory. Tuesday, it was as resplendent as Rodriguez, maintaining the sophomore fireballer’s shutout to secure the Orioles’...

title: Former Baltimore City MVA employee and two contractors accused of faking written driving tests in identity fraud scheme
creator: Dillon Mullan
content: A former Motor Vehicle Administration employee and two contractors are accused of faking dozens of written driving tests in a scheme to sell Maryland driver’s licenses and learner’s permits. The three defendants are charged with conspiracy to commit identity fraud with a value between $25,000 and $100,000, according to a news release from the attorney general’s office. “State employees have a responsibility to use their position to protect our residents, not to engage in conduct that puts...

title: Elections au Royaume-Uni: pourquoi l’alternance se profile après quatorze années de pouvoir conservateur
creator: Gérald Papy
content: Le Parti travailliste est donné largement gagnant du scrutin du 4 juillet. Son rival conservateur sera-t-il tenté par une radicalisation vers l’extrême droite? Autant les élections législatives des 30 juin et 7 juillet en France sont remplies d’incertitudes, autant celles au Royaume-Uni, le 4 juillet, en recèlent a priori peu. Les sondages sont récurrents et sans doute implacables. Ils donnent le Parti travailliste en tête avec 41% des suffrages et le Parti conservateur du Premier...

title: Supprimer la nomination des profs au profit d’un CDI? L’idée des Engagés qui crispe déjà le monde enseignant
creator: Soraya Ghali
content: Dans le cadre de leur tournée de consultations de la société civile, Georges-Louis Bouchez (MR) et Maxime Prévot (Les Engagés) ont rencontré les acteurs de l’enseignement, ceux de l’obligatoire et ceux du supérieur, à qui ils ont répété ce qui se trouvait inscrit dans leurs programmes. Et ça commence fort. Ainsi dans celui des Engagés: revaloriser le salaire mais, surtout, revoir la nomination des enseignants, l’assouplir, la moderniser, voire y renoncer au profit d’«un statut...

title: Anthony J Scalise
creator: gqlshare
content: Birth: November 24th, 1941 Death: June 24th, 2024 Anthony James Scalise, age 82, passed away on June 24, 2024. He was born on November 24, 1941. With his passing, the world lost a kind and humble soul, and he left behind a legacy that will forever be cherished by those who knew and loved him. Fondly known as TJ, Tony, or Papa, Anthony was everything to everyone. He began his career owning a gas station in Forest Hills, New York, where he met his wife Patricia, and after moving to Ft....

title: Mary L. Gibson
creator: gqlshare
content: Mary L. Gibson Mary Louise Gibson, 87, passed peacefully at home June 24, 2024 in Longwood, Florida with her two sons at her side, just 3 days shy of her 88th birthday. Mary Gibson was born in June 1936 in Watertown, South Dakota to Herbert Orin and Kathryn Irene (Quinlan) Skinner. She graduated from Watertown High School in 1954. Two years later she received her associate’s degree from Northern State Teachers College in Aberdeen, South Dakota, where Mary was president of the National Thespian...

title: Judith Stahl Douglas
creator: gqlshare
content: Birth: July 10th, 1946 Death: June 26th, 2024 Judith Stahl Douglas, 77, formerly of Coral Springs, Florida, died Wednesday, June 26, 2024, in Roswell, Georgia. Services will be held at Macon Memorial Park in Macon, Georgia at a later date. A graduate of the Woman’s College of Georgia, Mrs. Douglas was an educator and taught elementary school at Riverside Elementary School in Coral Springs, Florida, for over 25 years. Mrs. Douglas was the wife of the late Jeffery Allen Douglas and the daughter...

title: Utah State to fire football coach Blake Anderson
creator: Field Level Media
content: Utah State gave football coach Blake Anderson notice that it intends to fire him following an investigation into actions he reportedly took in spring 2023, the university announced today. He has 14 days to respond to the notice of firing, per the stipulations of his employment agreement. Also dismissed were Jerry Bovee, a deputy athletic director who was interim AD in 2023, and Austin Albrecht, director of player development and community. According to a university statement, the three violated...

title: Le dilemme immobilier belge: «Attendre une baisse des prix sur le marché n’est pas stratégique»
creator: Noé Spies
content: Les prix de l’immobilier poursuivent leur hausse. Elle est estimée à 1,3% au deuxième trimestre de cette année. Anticipable, au vu des derniers signaux du marché. Si la période du printemps est souvent synonyme de reprise, l’acheteur potentiel pourrait toutefois se retrouver face à un dilemme. Le récent rapport d’Immoweb, 1 er site immobilier belge, est sans équivoque. Les prix continuent d’augmenter, même s’ils le font de façon attendue et relativement mesurée (1,3%). La hausse...

title: Newly opened Lacrosse Barn wants to become epicenter for sport in Dallas area
creator: Leonardo Rosas

title: Local retailer The Cave opens outlet store at Greenback Square shopping center in Citrus Heights
creator: Jake Abbott

title: Xi Jinping and Tajikistan: "Good brothers walk hand in hand"
content: BEIJING/DUSHANBE, July 3 (Xinhua) -- "I am filled with joy and expectations to visit the home of a good neighbor and good brother during this crisp fall season," Chinese President Xi Jinping said in his signed article published in Tajik media ahead of his first state visit to the country in 2014. In this midsummer, Xi's third state visit to Tajikistan will surely write a new chapter for the friendship of the two countries. ROBE AND ORDER During his 2014 state visit, Xi was invited to Tajik...

title: Choppers fly over woods
content: Two helicopters attached to a brigade of the PLA Army fly over the wooded and hilly lands at a designated altitude during a flight training exercise on June 13, 2024. (eng.chinamil.com.cn/Photo by Sun Changyi) Two helicopters attached to a brigade of the PLA Army fly over the wooded and hilly lands at a designated altitude during a flight training exercise on June 13, 2024. title: UT Dallas researchers devise way to help avert power outages
creator: Leonardo Rosas

title: Child dead, left in car for ‘extended period of time’ in Cobb
creator: Caroline Silva - The Atlanta Journal-Constitution
content: A child found inside a vehicle in Cobb County died Tuesday evening, police said. Officers were called to the 800 block of Wanda Circle, off Windy Hill Road, shortly before 7 p.m. A 911 caller advised officials that a child had been in a vehicle “for an extended period of time,” Cobb police said. The child was taken to a hospital, where they were pronounced dead. The child’s name and age were not released. Officials did not state why the child was in the car. Though the vehicle was found in a...

title: Thousands flee homes in southern Gaza
creator: Reuters
content: REUTERS Palestinians, who fled the eastern part of Khan Younis, walk, after they were ordered by Israeli army to evacuate their neighbourhoods, amid Israel-Hamas conflict, in Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip July 1. REUTERS Palestinians, who fled the eastern part of Khan Younis after they were ordered by Israeli army to evacuate their neighborhoods, ride on a pickup truck loaded with belongings, amid Israel-Hamas conflict, in Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip July 2. REUTERS...

title: 242,000 people evacuated over rainstorms in east China province
content: HEFEI, July 2 (Xinhua) -- Rainstorms in east China's Anhui Province have left 991,000 residents affected and forced the evacuation of 242,000 people, as of Tuesday afternoon, local authorities said Tuesday. As of 4 p.m. Tuesday, rainstorms had wreaked havoc in 36 counties and districts in seven prefecture-level cities in Anhui, according to the provincial emergency-management department. The Yangtze River, China's longest river, has seen water levels in its Anhui section exceed their warning...

title: 習近平国家主席がカザフスタンのトカエフ大統領と友好的な意見交換
content: 習近平国家主席は現地時間7月2日夜、カザフスタンのトカエフ大統領の招待を受けて夕食を共にし、楽しく温かい雰囲気の中、中国とカザフスタンの関係や共通の関心事について友好的な意見交換を行った。新華社が伝えた。(編集NA) 「人民網日本語版」2024年7月3日

title: 新業態「村カフェ」が中国のアグリツーリズムの発展を牽引
content: 6月12日、「河茵カフェ」で美しい自然の景色を見ながらコーヒーを飲む観光客たち(撮影・張晨霖)。 北京市の郊外・懐柔区にある常住人口100人ほどの村・上王峪村には、「村カフェ」が3軒ある。そのうちの1軒「河茵カフェ」だけでも、週末になると、500人以上の客が訪れる。 北京の中心地から約50キロ離れた場所にある「村カフェ」は木々が青々と茂る山に囲まれ、店の前には湖も広がっている。多くの人が市内から車で一時間かけてくるのは、山の景色が広がる湖のほとりで、木製の椅子に座り、そよ風を感じながら、のんびりとコーヒーの香ばしい香りを楽しむためだ。 6月12日に撮影した「河茵カフェ」のアイスコーヒー(撮影・張晨霖)。 「河茵カフェ」のオーナー・魏銘さんは、「3年前に、初めてこの村に来た時に、ここに『村カフェ』を開くことを決めた。カフェの椅子に座って、山と湖がコラボする絵に描いたような景色を眺めていると、頭の中を空っぽにすることができる。私自身、市内からここにやって来るたびに、リセットできたと感じている」と話す。...

title: 生きた象形文字「トンパ文字」の美しさ 雲南省麗江市
content: showPlayer({id:"/pvservice/xml/2024/6/22/54183523-939e-4dd8-ad6e-d26b2893d8c5.xml",width:450,height:800}); 雲南省麗江市にある納西(ナシ)象形文字絵画体験館を訪れると、象形文字「トンパ文字」を用いて制作された芸術作品がずらりと目の前に並んでいる。作品の一つ一つが時の流れを静かに記録し、長い年月を生き続けてきた民族の物語を私たちに伝える。人民網が伝えた。 トンパ文字はナシ族に伝わる文字で、「生きた象形文字」と呼ばれる。ナシ語では「森究魯究」と呼ばれ、「木と石のしるし」という意味がある。遙か昔、ナシ族の祖先は木を見ると木を描き、石を見ると石を描き、感情や知識や経験が進化してトンパ文字になった。トンパ文字は麗江の植物・蕘花(アオガンピ)で作られたトンパ紙に、一画ずつ、一文字ずつしたためられ、代々伝えられてきた。...

title: 内蒙古、風力・太陽光・エネルギー貯蔵・水素・アンモニア一体化モデルプロジェクトが始動
content: 内蒙古(内モンゴル)自治区四子王旗風力・太陽光・エネルギー貯蔵・水素・アンモニア一体化モデルプロジェクトであるグリーンアンモニア合成建設プロジェクトが1日、四子王旗杜爾伯特化学工業パークで始まった。中国新聞網が伝えた。 四子王旗は内蒙古自治区烏蘭察布(ウランチャブ)市北西部に位置し、年間日照時間が3000時間を超え、風が強い上に強風の日が多く、全国風力資源1級中核エリアで、風力・太陽光発電資源が豊富だ。新エネルギーの計画設備容量は1300万kWと烏蘭察布市の54%を占める。クリーンエネルギーは徐々に、現地の工業経済成長のメインエンジンになっている。 同プロジェクトは四子王旗の風力・太陽光資源の強みを利用し、発電・消費・エネルギー貯蔵・応用を一体化した新エネルギー産業システムを構築する。プロジェクトは風力・太陽光・水素製造一体化とグリーンアンモニア合成の2つに分け実施される。投資総額は189億元(1元は約22.2円)。...

title: UNGA adopts proposal by China on AI
content: Fu Cong, China's permanent representative to the UN, introduces the draft resolution in New York on Monday. (WANG JIANGANG/XINHUA) The United Nations General Assembly adopted a resolution on Monday proposed by China to strengthen international cooperation on artificial intelligence capacity building and advocate for "an open, fair and nondiscriminatory business environment". AI technology is rapidly developing globally, but most people, especially those in developing countries, have not yet had...

title: Heartfelt welcome reflects robust ties
content: President Xi Jinping arrives in Astana, Kazakhstan on July 2, 2024, for the 24th Meeting of the Council of Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, and a state visit to Kazakhstan at the invitation of Kazakh President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev. Xi was warmly welcomed by Tokayev and a group of Kazakhstan senior officials upon his arrival at the airport. (Photo/Xinhua) "Dear Grandpa Xi Jinping, welcome to Astana, Kazakhstan," Daria, a 10-year-old Kazakh girl, told the Chinese...

title: Art bridges China-Kazakhstan friendship across generations, says director
content: showPlayer({id:"/pvservice/xml/2024/7/2/e01fb616-b0d2-4496-bc32-b343054c736d.xml",width:830,height:550}); "At first, Bakhitzhan Baikadamov thought Xian Xinghai was just an ordinary performer. Only when he reached the theater did he realize Xian's true talent as a musician," Sabit Kurmanbekov, the Kazakh art director of the film "The Composer," told People's Daily reporters at the Abay Opera House, one of the movie's filming locations. On Xian Xinghai Boulevard in Almaty, Kazakhstan, stands a...

content: Two British students and a local student take photos at the Guangdong Intangible Cultural Heritage Museum in Guangzhou, south China's Guangdong Province, July 1, 2024. Four students from the U.K. — Isabelle Oxford and Amelia Sleight from the University of...

title: Any act challenging one-China principle, provoking Chinese compatriots doomed to fail: mainland spokesperson
content: BEIJING, July 2 (Xinhua) -- A Chinese mainland spokesperson on Tuesday said that any act that challenges the one-China principle and provokes the compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Strait will definitely be punished and is doomed to fail. Chen Binhua, a spokesperson for the State Council Taiwan Affairs Office, made the remarks in response to a press inquiry regarding the separatist rhetoric made by Lai Ching-te and an official with Taiwan's mainland affairs council recently. Since he...

title: Talks critical to resolving EU tariff spat
content: Despite the challenging and highly complex nature of China-European Union negotiations on the latter's anti-subsidy investigation into Chinese electric vehicles, such talks remain the most effective way to prevent the escalation of bilateral economic and trade tensions, said market watchers and business leaders. To navigate the intensifying economic and trade competition, they said China and the EU should closely bind their industrial chains, enhance market integration, and achieve mutual...

title: 3rd China-CELAC ministerial forum on agriculture held in east China
content: JINAN, July 2 (Xinhua) -- The third ministerial forum on agriculture between China and the Community of Latin American and Caribbean States (CELAC) opened on Tuesday in the city of Weifang, east China's Shandong Province, focusing on cooperation and green development. The event has attracted 290 attendees, including 24 ministers or vice ministers and 13 ambassadors from 25 countries, as well as representatives of agricultural research institutes, enterprises and regional organizations. In a...

title: China-Kazakhstan economic, trade cooperation promising
content: Editor's note: China and Kazakhstan have witnessed flourishing trade and economic cooperation. Last year, bilateral trade between the two countries rose 32 percent year-on-year to $41 billion, making China the largest trading partner of Kazakhstan.

title: China redoubles efforts to prevent, control schistosomiasis during flood season
content: BEIJING, July 2 (Xinhua) -- The National Disease Control and Prevention Administration has released a circular on redoubling efforts to prevent and control schistosomiasis during this year's flood season, aiming to effectively stem the emergence and outbreak of the infectious disease. The circular urges local disease response departments to work with relevant authorities on coordinated, prompt and targeted measures such as blood fluke extermination, proper livestock management and...

title: China's High Energy Photon Source completes storage ring linkage
content: BEIJING, July 2 (Xinhua) -- The entire storage ring of China's high-energy synchrotron radiation light source in Beijing's suburban Huairou District has recently been completed and linked, according to the Chinese Academy of Sciences' Institute of High Energy Physics (IHEP). The light source, the High Energy Photon Source (HEPS), was built by IHEP and is a major science infrastructure project in China. Researchers will commission the storage ring beam following inter-system commissioning, IHEP...

title: China, Kazakhstan ignite light of fusion of civilizations
content: With China and Kazakhstan making more solid progress in Belt and Road cooperation, both sides are writing new chapters in cultural and people-to-people exchanges. Join People's Daily Online to discover a multi-faceted framework of people-to-people exchanges in areas including culture, art, education, and health between the two countries and explore how different civilizations live together in harmony. title: موظفو العمل المكتبي أكثر عرضة للإصابة بهذا المرض
content: - د ب أ كشفت الجمعية الألمانية لطب العيون إن موظفي العمل المكتبي أكثر عُرضة للإصابة بمتلازمة العين المكتبية، وذلك بسبب الجلوس لوقت طويل أمام شاشة الكمبيوتر والهواء الجاف الناتج عن مكيف الهواء أو جهاز التدفئة وارتداء عدسات لاصقة. وتتمثل أعراض متلازمة العين المكتبية في جفاف العين والاحمرار والحرقان والحكة وزيادة إفرازات الدموع والحساسية للضوء وضبابية الرؤية والشعور بوجود جسم غريب في العين والشعور بالجرح أو الخدش في العين. سبل العلاج ويمكن مواجهة جفاف العين بواسطة قطرات عين مرطبة وشرب...

title: El escarabajo atacameño que tiene el doble de proteínas que la vaca (pero una huella de carbono casi
creator: marcepo
invalid@example.com (marcepo)
content: El escarabajo atacameño que tiene el doble de proteínas que la vaca (pero una huella de carbono casi cien veces menor) Si seguimos comiendo tanta carne, el planeta se volverá inhabitable. Una solución es consumir insectos, como este nutritivo escarabajo de Atacama. FOTO: HERMAN LÓPEZ. AGRANDA TEXTO: 22 mayo, 2024 By Cristóbal Bley EN: Alimentación Biología Escarabajo Insectos Nutrición Universidad de Atacama COMPARTE: La industria ganadera no da para más. Lo que alguna vez fue una...

title: Chinese firms eye Morocco as way to cash in on US electric vehicle subsidies
content: After the United States passed new subsidies designed to boost domestic electric vehicle production and cut into Beijing’s supply chain dominance, Chinese manufacturers began investing in an unlikely place: Morocco. In the rolling hills near Tangiers and in industrial parks near the Atlantic Ocean, they have announced plans for new factories to make parts for EVs that may qualify for $7,500 credits to car buyers in the United States. Similar investments have been announced in other countries...

title: Soler, Wade and Ramos homer as the Giants beat the Braves 5-3
content: Jorge Soler and LaMonte Wade Jr. hit back-to-back homers to help the San Francisco Giants beat the Atlanta Braves 5-3 on Tuesday night. Heliot Ramos also went deep as San Francisco won for the sixth time in eight games. Mike Yastrzemski went 2 for 2 in his return from a strained left oblique. Hayden Birdsong (1-0) pitched five innings of two-run ball in his first big league win. The right-hander struck out five and walked two in his second major league start. Camilo Doval earned his 15th save...

title: 이효리, 남편 이상순 ‘완벽한 하루’ 공개 응원
creator: 박세연
content: KBS 더 시즌스 이효리의 레드카펫 KBS 제공 가수 이효리가 남편인 싱어송라이터 이상순의 신곡 출시를 응원했다. 이효리는 3일 자신의 인스타그램에 ‘#이상순 #완벽한하루 #PerfectDay #PerfectDay2024’라는 글과 함께 자신의 일상 모습을 담은 사진들을 올려 4일 공개되는 이상순 디지털 싱글 ‘완벽한 하루’ 음원 일부를 공개했다. 사진에는 이효리의 평범한 일상 모습이 여과 없이 담겨 있다. 반려견과 보내는 한때, 화장실 청소와 설거지 등...

title: YG ‘2024 지속가능경영보고서’ 발간... “긍정 영향력 확산”
creator: 김지혜
content: 사진=YG엔터테인먼트. YG엔터테인먼트가 더 나은 미래를 위한 책임과 노력을 담은 ‘2024 지속가능경영보고서’를 발간했다고 3일 밝혔다. 특히 이번 보고서는 지속가능경영 국제 가이드라인과 미국 지속가능성 회계기준위원회 공시 가이드라인 및 한국지속가능기준위원회 공시 기준 공개 초안을 적용해 엔터테인먼트 산업의 지속가능성 공시 모범 사례를 제시코자 했다. YG는 이번 보고서에서 이중 중대성 평가 결과에 따라 ▲기업지배구조 ▲기후변화...

title: 업비트, 첫 가상자산 투자 대회 시작
creator: 정길준
content: 두나무는 3일 첫 가상자산 투자 대회 '업비트 투자 메이저리그'를 시작했다. 업비트 투자 메이저리그는 사전 참가 등록을 완료한 업비트 이용자를 대상으로 진행하는 실전 투자 대회다. 오는 16일 오후 11시 59분까지 2주간 펼쳐진다. 참여 종목은 대회 기간 업비트에서 거래가 이뤄지는 모든 마켓의 가상자산이다. 기초 자산이 1000만원 미만인 경우에는 새우리그, 1000만원 이상이면 고래리그로 배정된다. 두나무는 누적 수익률을 기준으로 200명(리그별 상위...

title: ‘돌풍’ 김희애 “상대役 설경구=고급...다른 배우 상상가지 않아” [인터뷰1]
creator: 이주인
content: 사진=넷플릭스 제공. 김희애가 설경구와의 연기를 맞춘 소감을 밝혔다. 3일 오전 서울 종로구 한 카페에서 넷플릭스 오리지널 시리즈 ‘돌풍’의 배우 김희애 인터뷰가 진행됐다. 이날 김희애는 극 중 상대역 설경구에 대해 “우리 세대 가장 매력적인 배우다. 상대역을 할 수 있어 행운”이라며 “더군다나 그 나이 또래 연기 잘하는 배우가 많지만, 박동호는 아무나 할 수 있는 역이 아니라 가장 적임자라고 생각했다. 만약 다른 사람이었다면 어땠을까...

title: ‘별의별걸’ 나띠 “무대 위 카리스마 아닌 내 모습 보여주고 싶어 출연”
creator: 강주희
content: 키스오브라이프 멤버 나띠가 ‘별의별걸’ 출연 이유를 밝혔다. 3일 서울 영등포구 여의도 STUDIO X+U에서 ‘별의별걸: 추구미는 핫걸’(이하 ‘별의별걸’) 제작발표회가 열렸다. ‘별의별걸’은 MZ세대를 대표하는 핫걸들이 다양한 의뢰인들을 만나 그들의 취향과 삶을 심층적으로 분석해 인생 숏폼을 만들어 주는 프로그램이다. 이날 행사에는 키스오브라이프(KISS OF LIFE) 멤버 나띠, 댄스 크루 원밀리언 하리무, 여고생 모델 박제니, 연출을 맡은 김기민...

title: 윤석열 대통령, 베트남 총리 공식 방한 계기 접견
creator: Jun Kim
content: 윤석열 대통령은 오늘(7/2, 화) 오후 한국을 공식방문 중인 「팜밍찡(Pham Minh Chinh)」 베트남 총리를 접견하고, 양국 관계 발전 방안에 대해 의견을 교환했다. 윤 대통령은 양국 간 통관 간소화 등 제도적 협력을 계속 강화함으로써 교역과 투자가 더욱 활성화되기를 바란다고 하고, 우리 퇴역함, 퇴역 경비정 양도 사업과 방산 협력이 차질 없이 진행되어 국방, 안보 분야의 전략적 협력을 강화해 나가길 바란다고 했다. 찡 총리는...

title: Vì sao Google quyết định ra mắt sớm Pixel 9?
content: So với ngày diễn ra sự kiện năm ngoái là 4.10, thời điểm sự kiện năm nay sớm hơn khoảng 1,5 tháng. Điều này khiến nhiều người ngạc nhiên, đặc biệt khi tháng 10 đã được công ty liên tục duy trì từ năm 2016, nơi họ ra mắt loạt Pixel và Pixel XL thế hệ đầu tiên. Nhiều người đã đặt dấu hỏi về việc Google tổ chức sớm sự kiện có thể liên quan đến loạt Pixel 9 trong năm nay. Hình ảnh kết xuất...

title: Nga-Ấn Độ củng cố hợp tác quốc phòng với liên doanh vũ khí
Nhật Bản phát hành tiền giấy 3D mới sau 20 năm
content: Đây là lần đầu tiên kể từ năm 2004, Nhật Bản cập nhật thiết kế tiền giấy . Những tờ tiền này sử dụng các mẫu in để tạo ra ảnh 3 chiều từ các bức chân dung nhìn về nhiều hướng khác nhau, tùy thuộc vào góc nhìn. Đây là công nghệ đầu tiên trên thế giới dành cho tiền giấy theo mô tả của Cục In ấn quốc gia Nhật Bản, theo Reuters. Các quan chức Nhật Bản tham dự sự kiện lưu thông tiền giấy...

title: Nghị sĩ đảng Dân chủ đầu tiên kêu gọi ông Biden rút khỏi cuộc bầu cử Mỹ
content: "Nhận thấy rằng, không giống như cựu Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump, cam kết đầu tiên của Tổng thống Biden luôn là vì đất nước chúng ta chứ không phải bản thân ông ấy, tôi hy vọng ông ấy sẽ đưa ra quyết định đầy khó khăn và đau khổ là rút lui. Tôi trân trọng kêu gọi ông ấy làm như thế", nghị sĩ Lloyd Doggett nhấn mạnh trong một tuyên bố, theo AFP. Ông Doggett đưa ra lời kêu gọi trên sau khi Tổng thống...

title: Hàng trăm người trúng độc vì mỏ vàng rò rỉ ở Bờ Biển Ngà
content: Người dân tìm vàng tại Bờ Biển Ngà REUTERS Hãng AFP ngày 3.7 đưa tin nguồn nước ô nhiễm từ một mỏ vàng chảy vào một con sông ở Bờ Biển Ngà khiến 185 người bị ngộ độc. Sông Cavalla, nguồn nước uống và thủy sản quan trọng trong khu vực, chảy dài hàng trăm kilomet dọc theo phía tây của quốc gia Tây Phi này. Quan chức địa phương Moussa Dao cho hay rằng hồi cuối tháng trước, vết nứt ở một trong các...

title: Derek Trejo habla tras detención de Saúl “N”, presunto asesino de su mamá
creator: El Universal
content: La Fiscalía General de Justicia de la Ciudad de México detuvo a Saúl “N” , acusado del feminicidio de Verónica , mamá del conocido Tiktoker Derek Trejo. El presunto asesino fue detenido en la alcaldía Iztapalapa, luego de ser buscado desde el pasado 17 de junio, cuando el cuerpo de la mujer fue localizado en un hotel en la alcaldía de Azcapotzalco. Detiene la Fiscalía CDMX en Iztapalapa a Saúl “N”, presunto responsable del feminicidio de Verónica, madre del creador de contenido Derek...

title: 韓 배터리 3사 점유율 20%도 못 지킬 위기
creator: gwang0e@chosunbiz.com (이광영 기자)
content: 국내 배터리 3사(LG에너지솔루션·삼성SDI·SK온)가 전기차 배터리 사용량 시장 점유율 20%대를 지키지 못할 위기다. 중국에서 전기차 시장 성장이 견조한 가운데 미국·유럽 등에서 시장 둔화가 지속되고 있어서다. 3일 에너지 전문 시장조사업체 SNE리서치에 따르면 국내 배터리 3사의 배터리 사용량 시장 점유율은 22.3%를 기록했다. 전년 동기 대비 2.8%포인트 내렸다. LG에너지솔루션은 전년 동기 대비 사용량이 5.6% 증가했지만 점유율은 2023년 14.7%에서 올해...

title: Néctares Del Frutal apoya la educación con su promoción “Encuentra tu suerte con Del Frutal”
creator: Editor 3
content: Guatemala. Alimentos Maravilla, S.A. y su marca líder, Del Frutal, inician su innovadora promoción «Encuentra tu suerte con Del Frutal». Esta iniciativa tiene como objetivo premiar a sus consumidores y, por séptimo año, contribuir a mejorar los ambientes educativos mediante el donativo de escritorios a diversas escuelas para beneficio de cientos de niños en el país. Esta promoción es una forma innovadora de acercar a Del Frutal con sus consumidores y agradecerles, premiando su lealtad...

title: Aparecen animales envenenados en colonia del norte de Mérida
creator: AIM
content: MÉRIDA.- Varios animales aparecieron muertos esta mañana en la colonia García Ginerés por presunto envenenamiento. Los hechos fueron reportados por vecinos de esa colonia, quienes comentaron a las autoridades que no es la primera vez que se atenta contra los animales. Según reportes, los animales aparecieron muertos en las viviendas y fueron los dueños quienes los sacaron a las aceras para que las autoridades puedan hacer las investigaciones correspondientes. Regístrate a nuestro...

title: El tiempo en Puntallana: previsión meteorológica para hoy, miércoles 3 de julio
creator: eldia.es
content: Hoy en , se espera un día con niebla y bruma en las primeras horas de la mañana, lo que podría afectar la visibilidad en las carreteras. A medida que avance la mañana, la niebla se disipará y dará paso a un cielo muy nuboso, con posibilidad de algunas brumas dispersas. No se esperan precipitaciones durante todo el día, por lo que se mantendrá un ambiente seco en la zona. Las temperaturas se mantendrán suaves, con máximas que alcanzarán los 22 grados durante la tarde. La humedad...

title: El tiempo en Puntagorda: previsión meteorológica para hoy, miércoles 3 de julio
creator: eldia.es
content: Hoy en , el cielo estará mayormente despejado durante la mañana y la tarde, con algunas brumas presentes en las primeras horas de la mañana. La temperatura oscilará entre los 16°C y los 21°C, siendo una jornada agradable y templada. La humedad relativa se mantendrá en niveles moderados, entre el 20% y el 81%, lo que indica un día seco en general. No se esperan precipitaciones a lo largo del día, por lo que se puede disfrutar de actividades al aire libre sin preocupaciones. El viento...
